name: An Island Apart
description:
My teammates and I created a video game and composed a soundtrack in just 48 hours for a charity game jam! Please check out my game below and donate on behalf of my team. All proceeds go towards AbleGamers, a charity dedicated to creating communities and accessibility tools for gamers with disabilities. Be sure to include our game in your donation so we can win the most fundraised award! Donate: https://tinyurl.com/GMJ21Fundraiser

You just crashed on an island due to a strong storm. You have lost all hope until you receive messages from another stranded person. Find hope and the will to keep going through their messages!

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Resources Used:

Boat - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/boats-polypack-189866

Sounds - https://freesound.org/

Toon Shader Article - https://roystan.net/articles/toon-water.html
